adam.name: Adam Drummond
adam.caption: MELONsquad Leader. Bringer of melons to MLH. Also loves a game of Chrome Dino!

blahaj.name: BLAHAJ
blahaj.caption: King of BLAHAJgang, honorary fellow of MELONsquad. We love BLAHAJ!

jacklyn.name: Jacklyn Biggin
jacklyn.caption: Leader of BLAHAJgang, unable to consume melon (allergies - RIP). Honorary fellow of MELONsquad.

stephen.name: Stephen
stephen.caption: Has the BLAHAJgang profile pic but didn't join. Honorary fellow of MELONsquad because we like him.

ryan.name: Ryan Swift
ryan.caption: #1 fan of MELONsquad, wishes it was a separate entity to BLAHAJgang (never gonna happen!!)

ayush.name: Ayush Ganotra
ayush.caption: Doesn't really know how to pronounce BLAHAJ but knows how to pronounce melon so we welcomed him into the squad.

midhat.name: Midhat
midhat.caption: The mysterious Midhat... we don't know where he came from, yet he's a cool guy. He recently adopted a blahaj

surya.name: Surya
surya.caption: I don't think he knows exactly what's going on and we kind of forced him into BLAHAJgang but he's here now!

jenna.name: Jenna Everard
jenna.caption: We don't know much about Jenna but it's her first Local Hack Day so BE KIND TO HER AND GIVE HER BLAHAJ LOVE

hhvv970.name: hhvv970
hhvv970.caption: Chief of melon security. He's on the frontline of our army so don't try to fite him â€” you will always lose!!

gagan.name: Gagan Vats
gagan.caption: It's his first ever hackathon so go nice on him. Never mess with a hacky pig otherwise you'll get hit with its lightsaber...

leila.name: Leila
leila.caption: Another beginner... Treat her with care. We gotta protect these new hackers like they've been hacking for years!

will l.name: Will Lifferth
will l.caption: Will is pretty awesome. He's the one who brought the leader of BLAHAJgang to us. What a legend!!

ahelee.name: Ahelee
ahelee.caption: This ain't her first Local Hack Day... she knows what to expect. She's here for the melons through and through!

malak.name: Malak Abdeldayem
malak.caption: Seems to know more than all of us combined yet she's never been on the MELON scene before??

jamie.name: Jamie Liao
jamie.caption: 'WE GOT ONE OF THE BEST PEOPLE IN THE WORLD IN THE BLAHAJGANG FRIENDS' - Jack... need we say more?

nathan.name: Nathan Dimmer
nathan.caption: It took a while to persuade him to join the squad. Now he's here, he'll regret not joining earlier!

pratyush.name: Pratyush Raj
pratyush.caption: He has the cutest dogs ever. If you haven't seen them, go ask him for a photo. You won't disagree here!
